name: design loft, inc.
description:
design loft, inc. offers complete graphic design services, including website design, print design and logo design at affordable prices. Since 2004, we have been delivering professional, high-quality graphic design services to major corporations, small businesses, and non-profit organizations across the United States.
Located in Plainfield, Illinois, we are proud of our ability to combine our years of graphic design experience, educational background & creativity, with our ability to bond with our customers graphic design needs to achieve professional graphic design results - a design image that will become your "trademark" that your customers will identify you and your business with for years to come. design loft's creative graphic design professionals offers professional design agency experience and skill sets operating with a low overhead. The result is high-quality, personalized, graphic design services, within a much smaller budget. Our designers are flexible, friendly and easy to work with. We consider each and every graphic design customer to be our most important client whether their needs are website design, logo design, print design or corporate identity materials. We treat each design graphic customer with the personalized attention that they expect and deserve for their business design needs. We can help your business stand out with its own logo, own identity and creative design pieces that have a cohesive look across the board - to create your branding. We bring together simple navigation and smart design - to create a functional, eye-catching website. Or can create the letterheads and envelopes that display your professional graphic design image to your clients.
